verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Say you, 'I take refuge with the Lord of Day break;
verse.verse_2: 'From the evil of all His creatures;
verse.verse_3: 'And from the evil of the darkening one when it sets.
verse.verse_4: 'And from the evil of those women who blow in the knots.
verse.verse_5: 'And from the evil of the envier when he envies me!'
